content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Mañana por la mañana':
Selecciona la traducción para 'El próximo lunes':

content.stimulus_en: She (not/work) ________ tomorrow.
They (fly) ________ to London on Friday.
I (meet) ________ my friend tonight.
We (have) ________ a meeting at 10 AM.
(be) ________ he coming to the party?
What time (be) ________ you leaving?
We are having dinner at a nice restaurant tonight.
Are doing you anything special this weekend?
They are flying to New York next week.
I'm the meeting dentist at 4 o'clock.
She is playing tennis with Sarah tomorrow morning.
He seeing is his lawyer on Tuesday.
